

###### (Automatically generated documentation)

# Set Window to Wall Ratio

## Description
Sets the window-to-wall ratio for all facades to a specific number.

## Modeler Description
This measure deletes all existing windows and adds new ribbons of windows to meet the target ratio.

## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Window to Wall Ratio (fraction)
Enter a number between 0.0 and 0.99 (e.g., 0.4 for 40%)
**Name:** wwr,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false
